metadata.title: CVE-2024-26964 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:usb: xhci: Add error handling in xhci_map_urb_for_dmaCurrently xhci_map_urb_for_dma() creates a temporary buffer and copiesthe SG list to the new linear buffer. But if the kzalloc_node() fails,then the following sg_pcopy_to_buffer() can lead to crash since ittries to memcpy to NULL pointer.So return -ENOMEM if kzalloc returns null pointer.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
